backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing user profile access control plus public contact form submission with timestamped storage and admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend modification requirements, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing one‑line summaries of major frontend components for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LandingPage component as the full app view.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: React contact form handling validation, submission via hook, and success UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact section showing Scotland flag location card, email card, and the ContactForm component.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with contact icons, social links, WhatsApp CTA, and the custom attribution text.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Renders the hero section with title, tagline, description, call-to-action buttons, and a scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Assembles the full landing page layout with a background image and all major sections.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Displays a grid of tour feature cards highlighting key selling points.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Shows an individual review with star rating, excerpt, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Renders the reviews section with a list of curated reviews and a TripAdvisor CTA.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Exports a list of structured review objects for display on the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s Internet Identity and handles query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
Defines a mutation hook to submit contact form data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, CSS variables, themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and storing, retrieving, or clearing them in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and overall state for build planning.
